channel.title: I got a hacker stalker help
channel.description: ok 3 days ago from now i sent a copy of the source i have to a person that said that they would help me and to day 3 days from sending the file she or he starts typing on my computer and that i can never get rid of her how do i get rid of her or what program i can buy to stop hackers?

item.title: I got a hacker stalker help
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

NO. The deaf leading the blind leading the paraplegics.

item.title: I got a hacker stalker help
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“eballer48, post:3, topic:417769”][quote author=`SJ_ link=topic=520316.msg3778518#msg3778518 date=1318281852]

howtogeek.com

What Is the Service Host Process (svchost.exe) and Why Are So Many Running?

If you’ve ever browsed through Task Manager, you may have wondered why there are so many Service Host processes running. You can’t kill them, and you sure didn’t start them. So, what are they?


[/quote]

i dont see what svchost.exe has to do with this…? Plus its mainly just an XP problem. Cases of this on vista are rare even though it is the god awful os it is.

If you thing you have a rat use this. Scan will take 10-30 minutes and you’ll be clean. This is one of the best spyware out there! hope i could help.

Superantispyware: http://downloads.superantispyware.com/downloads/SUPERAntiSpyware.exe[/quote]

oops, that was a no-brainer. My bad.

http://shop.malwarebytes.org/Anti-malware

You can youtube or google a serial key to get pro.

Read full topic
